Sentencas: Thermal mismatch significantly influences the stress state and lifetime of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Topology optimization of the microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The microstructure of the LSM-YSZ cathode is optimized by using the asymptotic homogenization method and three-phase material topology optimization to improve thermal mismatch.
Titulo: Topology optimization of the microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Two orthogonal microstructures are obtained by taking minimum thermal mismatch as the object with some constraints.
Titulo: Topology optimization of the microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The microstructures constitute a cathode in the form of periodic fiber bundles.
Titulo: Topology optimization of the microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Results show that the coefficients of the thermal expansion of the microstructures are almost equal to those of the electrolyte layer at different temperatures, thus eliminating thermal mismatch.
Titulo: Topology optimization of the microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The microstructures have higher effective ion conductivity than typical cathodes.
Titulo: Topology optimization of the microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The optimization results are helpful for the design of future electrodes.
Titulo: Topology optimization of the microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
